name: n8n-nodes-browserless
description: N8n node to perform headless browser operations such as saving screenshots and PDF, using the browserless library

scripts.lint: tslint -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && eslint nodes package.json
scripts.lintfix: tslint --fix -p tsconfig.json -c tslint.json && eslint nodes package.json --fix
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint -c .eslintrc.prepublish.js nodes package.json
